resources.string: We just need your registered phone number to sent you password reset instructions.
I understand the privacy of Pick Pamphlet and by signing up I accept all Terms & Conditions

EASY DEALS is a new product of Pick pamphlet pvt ltd, this platform is solving problems of property dealers in many ways. We have made things easier for property dealers now they don\'t need to take bulky diaries with them everytime nor they have to put pressure on their brain to remember their data. #avoidstress
Rate us on the Play Store
The easiest way to record your entries.!
Easy Deals has User friendly Interface!
Anyone can use our App to want to make his work easy!
Easy Deals is a product of PickPamphlet!
To see the welcome slider again, goto Settings -> apps -> welcome slider -> clear data

2. You may also choose to opt out, via sending your email address to: [opt-out email].
